title: 2.5baths, Fully Furnished, ALL Utilities Included, Next to HBS
posting_body: ['Looking for convenience and proximity to universities, downtown Boston/Cambridge, and highways without sacrificing space or quality?', ' Then this place is for you...', '3 bed, 2.5 bath, 3 dedicated parking spots - 1,600 sqftt of living space, plus extra storage space', 'Availability: August 2022', '- New construction, next to HBS.', '- ALL utilities included, fully furnished with modern furniture.', 'No moving headaches or costs, no time wasted... simply come in and start enjoying your new home right from day 1', '- 3 floors, plus basement for storage.', 'Layout of the apartment:', 'Floor 1: Living Room, Dining Room, kitchen, half-bath', 'Floor 2: 2 bedrooms, full bath', 'Floor 3: Extra large bedroom, full bath', 'Extras:', '* Washer and dryer on second floor (conveniently located next to bedrooms)', '* State-of-the-art security system(ADT),', '* Modern style bamboo blinds.', '* Working gas fireplace,', 'First and last month deposit required to move in.', 'For further questions or showings, contact John – 617-460-5130']
